title: Skt T1 Skins on Live servers?!
body: My friend recently got Skt T1 renew ton from hex tech crafting. And he unlocked it and it actually works. Rito plz??

replies.body:
They have been on live since 6.16.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-616-notes#patch-upcoming-skins
This is working as intended. :) While the skins were only available until September 1st in the store, you can still get them through Hextech Crafting!
